#!/bin/zsh

# Get the clipboard contents as the directory path
# Create the render directory if it doesn't exist
# Loop through all files in the directory

  # Check if it's an mp4 file
    # Get the basename
    # Convert the mp4
    # Copy original creation time
dirPath="{cilpboard}"


renderDir="$dirPath/render"
    
mkdir -p "$renderDir"


for file in "$dirPath/"* ; do
  if [[ $file =~ \.mp4$ ]]; then
    fileName=$(basename "$file")
    fileName="${fileName%.*}"
    ffmpeg -i "$file" -c copy "$renderDir/$fileName-opt.mp4"
    touch -r "$file" "$renderDir/$fileName-opt.mp4"

  fi

done
alfredsnippet.name: Batch Opt to Mp4
